name: implore

[ T + to infinitive ] to ask someone to do or not do something in a very sincere, emotional, and determined way: implore someone to do something She implored her parents not to send her away to school.

[ T ] literary to ask for something in a sincere and emotional way: She clasped her hands, and glancing upward, seemed to implore divine assistance.
